column4: Hi everyone. I need help with opening ports (I think) as I cant connect to any MSN servers through port 1863 even though it is open on my router. Any suggestions?
Does anyone know how to open ports? Not on a router though as I have already done that.
an 'open port' would be a program listening on that port for connections
I'm not even sure it is a port problem anyway. Basically I can't connect to MSN servers becase the connection is refused
